PIN.values: |Shift+T=EditTrackName&cr;&lf;A+RB=AddCue (With the current UI Values)&cr;&lf;A+RB+Ctr=AddCueOnNewTrack&cr;&lf;D+OnSelectedCue+RB=DeleteCue &cr;&lf;C+OnSelectedCue+RB=CloneCue (to any track) M+RB+OnSelectedCue=MoveCue (+Ctr=Snap) &cr;&lf;F+MouseWheel+OnSelectedCue=EditFadeTime Alt+N=EditName&cr;&lf;Alt+V OnSelectedCue=EditValues&cr;&lf;OnControllerUI:&cr;&lf;LB=EditValue &cr;&lf;LB+Shift=Slow &cr;&lf;LB+Ctr=Multiple &cr;&lf;RB+Ctr=EditMode (Lin,Exp,Start,End)&cr;&lf;Shift+E=MoveMulti&cr;&lf;Shift+C=CopyMulti&cr;&lf;OnEditMulti:&cr;&lf;Shif+RB=SelectTracks&cr;&lf;Ctr+RB=MoveCues&cr;&lf;LoopPoints=SelectArea|

|If TrackName=V-Name: CueName=Last Founded (not Empty)&cr;&lf;Do name the first and leave the rest empty to animate along the same name) &cr;&lf;PresetPos=VideoPlayerPointer&cr;&lf;Only First 2 Controls And Buttons are active and sent&cr;&lf;(The rest of the values are still there but ony visible on edit) |
